name: Dreaming With the Fishes
description:
A quick platformer about a tired fish dreaming about having some legs.

Jump and dash your way to the end of the dream.

CREDITS:

Eric Moen - Design, Programming, Art, and Sound

Sebastian Lague's 2D Platformer Controller Tutorial:

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MbWK8bCAU2w&list=PLFt_AvWsXl0f0hqURlhyIoAabKPgRsqjz

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

Walk - A/D or Arrow Keys

Jump - Z or Space

Dash - X or Left Shift

XBOX CONTROLS:

Walk - Left Stick

Jump - A

Dash - X
